::Feline::

She smiled as Skulletron took her hand. She nodded, "But there is 
something else I have in mind.  More than what was expected. I have a 
plan."  She smiled and whispered into his ear,"we have the opertunity 
to destroy from within.  They will be bringing back two bots from the 
field, badly wounded.  We could program them to serve Zardus and 
cause chaos from within."  She kissed his cheek and smiled as they 
walked. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Skulletron::
> 
>        Skulletron grinned.
> 
>        "I've already seen every area of the ship, but I haven't 
been to
> them.  I have access to all of the Cybertronian Fire.  I also have 
knowledge
> of the bot's names.  In fact, right now, I could incinerate all the 
Maximals
> here by changing the autogun settings, if I felt like it.  But, 
there's no
> need for anyone to die on this mission.  Here, we'll tour the ship 
together,
> and I'll try to patch some information back to the Alliance base, 
for
> Zardus.  Let's go," He said, as he grabbed Feline's hand and held 
it in his
> own two hands.
